mapper.insert: insert into crm_user (user_id, role_id, category_id, `status`, `name`, `password`, nickname, salt, sex, email, telephone, address, birthday, reg_ip, reg_time, last_login_time, lostpw_time, weixinid, dashboard) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{regIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lostpwTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{weixinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dashboard,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update crm_user set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, reg_ip = #{regIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lostpw_time = #{lostpwTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, weixinid = #{weixinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dashboard = #{dashboard,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_id, role_id, category_id, `status`, `name`, `password`, nickname, salt, sex, email, telephone, address, birthday, reg_ip, reg_time, last_login_time, lostpw_time, weixinid, dashboard from crm_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select user_id, role_id, category_id, `status`, `name`, `password`, nickname, salt, sex, email, telephone, address, birthday, reg_ip, reg_time, last_login_time, lostpw_time, weixinid, dashboard from crm_user
